description.brazilian: Derrube todas as cabeças de bonecos de neve em Iceceratops.
description.dutch: Sla het hoofd van elke sneeuwpop eraf in IJsceratops.
description.english: Knock off every snowman's head in 'Iceceratops'.
description.french: Faites tomber la tête de chaque bonhomme de neige de Glaceratops.
description.german: Hau allen Schneemännern in „Iceceratops“ den Kopf ab.
description.japanese: Iceceratopsですべての雪だるまの頭を落とす。
description.portuguese: Acerta em todas as cabeças dos homens de neve em Iceceratops.
description.schinese: 打掉所有Iceceratops的雪人的脑袋。
description.spanish: Liquida a todos los muñecos de nieve en Iceceratops.
description.tchinese: 在冰角面中踢掉所有雪人的腦袋。

description.brazilian: Abra todas as eras do Espaço Entre o Tempo.
description.dutch: Open elk gebied in Ruimte Tussen Tijd.
description.english: Open every era in 'Space Between Time'.
description.french: Ouvrez chaque ère de l’espace infratemporel.
description.german: Öffne alle Ären in „Raum zwischen der Zeit“.
description.japanese: 時の狭間ですべての時代を開く。
description.koreana: 시간 사이의 공간에서 모든 시대를 여세요.
description.portuguese: Abre todas as eras no Espaço entre o tempo.
description.schinese: 打开时空间隙的每一个时代。
description.spanish: Abre todas las eras en el espacio intertemporal.
description.tchinese: 在時空裂縫中開啟所有紀元。

displayName.japanese: ダーウィンのお気に入り

description.brazilian: Ocupe o seu lugar na linha temporal evolucionária.
description.dutch: Neem je plaats in in de evolutietijdlijn.
description.english: Take your place in the evolutionary timeline.
description.french: Occupez votre place dans la chaîne évolutive.
description.german: Nimm deinen Platz in der Evolutions-Zeitachse ein.
description.japanese: 進化の時間軸で、あるべき場所にたどり着く。
description.portuguese: Coloca-te na linha temporal de evolução.
description.schinese: 在进化时间线上取得你的一席之地。
description.spanish: Ocupa tu lugar en la línea temporal de la evolución.
description.tchinese: 在進化論時間線中獲得一席之地。

description.brazilian: Veja a Cleocatra recebendo o que merece.
description.dutch: Kijk toe hoe Cleokatra haar lesje leert.
description.english: Witness Cleocatra get her comeuppance.
description.french: Assistez à la rétribution de Cleocatra.
description.german: Schau dir Cleocatras wohlverdiente Strafe an.
description.japanese: Cleocatraが罰を受けるところを見届ける。
description.koreana: Cleocatra가 마땅한 벌을 받는 걸 목격하세요.
description.portuguese: Assiste á ocupação do trono da Cleocatra.
description.schinese: 见证Cleocatra得到她的报应。
description.spanish: Mira a Cleocatra recibir su merecido.
description.tchinese: 目睹Cleocatra遭報應。

description.brazilian: Encontre o “easter egg” do Pântano Cajun.
description.dutch: Vind het paasei in Cajun Kuddemoeras.
description.english: Find the easter egg in 'Cajun Mob Bog'.
description.french: Trouvez l’œuf en chocolat dans la Tourbière cajun.
description.german: Finde das Easter Egg in „Cajun-Mafia-Sumpf“.
description.japanese: Cajun Mob Bogでイースターエッグを見つける。
description.koreana: 케이준 조폭 늪지에서 이스터 에그를 찾으세요.
description.portuguese: Encontra o segredo em Cajun Mob Bog.
description.schinese: 在Cajun暴徒沼泽中找到复活节彩蛋。
description.spanish: Encuentra el huevo de pascua en el Pantano Cajún.
description.tchinese: 在「卡津暴徒沼澤」關卡中找到復活節彩蛋。

description.brazilian: Faça com que o Rei Jeremy saia do caminho.
description.dutch: Zorg dat koning Jeremy je uit de weg gaat.
description.english: Get King Jeremy to move out of your way.
description.french: Poussez le roi Jeremy à libérer le passage.
description.german: Bringe König Jeremy dazu, aus deinem Weg zu gehen.
description.japanese: King Jeremyを邪魔にならない場所に動かす。
description.portuguese: Convence o Rei Jeremy a desviar-se do teu caminho.
description.schinese: 让Jeremy国王让路。
description.spanish: Haz que el rey Jeremy se aparte de tu camino.
description.tchinese: 讓Jeremy國王不再擋你的道。

description.brazilian: Derrote o Cybro sem sofrer qualquer dano.
description.dutch: Versla Cybro zonder schade op te lopen.
description.english: Defeat Cybro without taking damage.
description.french: Éliminez Cybro sans subir de dégâts.
description.german: Besiege Cybro, ohne Schaden zu erleiden.
description.japanese: ダメージを受けずにCybroを倒す。
description.portuguese: Derrota o Cybro sem levar dano.
description.schinese: 击败Cybro，且没受到任何伤害。
description.spanish: Vence a Cybro sin recibir daño.
description.tchinese: 無傷擊敗Cybro 。

description.brazilian: Não conseguiu escapar de Ceratopple.
description.dutch: Ren niet weg van Ceratoppel.
description.english: Fail to run away from Ceratopple.
description.french: Échouez dans votre fuite face à Ceratopple.
description.german: Fliehe nicht vor Ceratopple.
description.japanese: Ceratoppleからの逃亡に失敗する。
description.portuguese: Falha ao fugir do Ceratopple.
description.schinese: 没能成功逃离Ceratopple。
description.spanish: Fracasa al intentar escapar de Ceratopple.
description.tchinese: 在Ceratopple手上逃脫失敗。

description.brazilian: Deixe o trem mergulhar em sua perdição, seu monstro!
description.dutch: Laat de trein kapotvallen, jij, monster!
description.english: Let the train plummet to its doom, you monster!
description.french: Laissez le train plonger à sa perte, espèce de monstre !
description.german: Lass den Zug ins Verderben stürzen. Du Monster!
description.japanese: 列車を破滅に追いやれ！
description.koreana: 기차가 떨어지게 놔둬, 이 괴물 녀석!
description.portuguese: Deixa o comboio cair para o seu destino cruel, seu monstro!
description.schinese: 放任火车坠毁，你这个禽兽！
description.spanish: ¡Deja que el tren se precipite hacia su perdición, monstruo!
description.tchinese: 你這個怪物，居然就這樣放任火車墜毀！

description.brazilian: Encontre a tela de demonstração escondida.
description.dutch: Vind het scherm met de verborgen demo.
description.english: Find the hidden "demo" screen.
description.french: Trouvez l’écran de démo caché.
description.german: Finde den versteckten Demo-Bildschirm.
description.japanese: 隠されたデモ画面を見つけ出す。
description.portuguese: Encontra o ecrã de Demo.
description.schinese: 找到隐藏的演示屏幕。
description.spanish: Encuentra la pantalla de demostración oculta.
description.tchinese: 找到隱藏的試玩版介面。

description.brazilian: Encontre o husky escondido.
description.dutch: Ontgrendel Mijn naam is haas, ga je gong.
description.english: Unlock 'Hare Today, Gong Tomorrow'
description.french: Déverrouillez Lièvre aujourd’hui, Gong demain.
description.german: Schalte „Vom Hasen zum Gong“ frei.
description.japanese: Hare Today, Gong Tomorrowをアンロックする。
description.koreana: 오늘 토끼를 잠금 해제하고 내일 공을 치세요.
description.portuguese: Desbloqueia o Hare Today, Gong Tomorrow.
description.schinese: 今天解锁野兔，明天敲响大锣。
description.spanish: Hoy desbloquea la liebre; mañana, el gong.
description.tchinese: 解鎖「今天是兔子，明天變銅鑼」關卡。

description.brazilian: Encontra o Husky escondido.
description.dutch: Vind de verstopte husky.
description.english: Find the hidden husky
description.french: Trouvez le husky caché.
description.german: Finde den versteckten Husky.
description.japanese: 隠されたハスキーを探し出す。
description.portuguese: Encontra o Husky escondido.
description.schinese: 找到隐藏的哈士奇。
description.spanish: Encuentra al husky oculto.
description.tchinese: 找到隱藏的哈士奇。

displayName.portuguese: Não são só Os Gatos Que Não Têm Vertigens

description.brazilian: Veja os fogos de artifício na cabeça do Daucus.
description.dutch: Bekijk het vuurwerk vanaf Daucus' hoofd.
description.english: Watch the fireworks from Daucus' head
description.french: Assistez au feu d’artifice sur la tête de Daucus.
description.german: Verfolge das Feuerwerk von Daucus‘ Kopf.
description.japanese: Daucusの頭の上から花火を見る。
description.portuguese: Assiste aos foguetes na cabeça do Daucus.
description.schinese: 从Daucus的头上看烟花。
description.spanish: Mira los fuegos artificiales desde la cabeza de Daucus.
description.tchinese: 在Daucus的腦袋之巔看煙火。

displayName.brazilian: Não é como eu me lembro dessa história
displayName.dutch: Niet hoe ik het me herinner
displayName.english: Not How I Remember The Story
displayName.german: Das habe ich aber anders in Erinnerung
displayName.japanese: こうじゃなかった気がする
displayName.portuguese: Não É Assim Que Me Lembro Da História
displayName.schinese: 我记得故事不是这样的
displayName.spanish: No es así cómo lo recordaba
displayName.tchinese: 我怎麼記得不是這樣的

description.brazilian: Vença a corrida do oeste selvagem de Fable.
description.dutch: Versla Fable's race in het wilde westen.
description.english: Beat Fable's wild west race.
description.french: Remportez la course du Far West de Fable.
description.german: Meistere Fables Wildwest-Rennen.
description.japanese: Fableのワイルドウェストレースに勝つ。
description.portuguese: Derrota a corrida no faroeste da Fable.
description.schinese: 打赢Fable（寓言）的狂野西部赛。
description.spanish: Vence en la carrera del salvaje Oeste de Fable.
description.tchinese: 在Fable的狂野西部競賽中獲勝。

description.brazilian: Fale com a Nancy sobre suas aventuras australianas.
description.dutch: Praat met Nancy over haar Australische avonturen.
description.english: Speak to Nancy about her Australian adventures.
description.french: Parlez à Nancy à propos de ses aventures en Australie.
description.german: Sprich mit Nancy über ihre Abenteuer in Australien.
description.japanese: Nancyにオーストラリアの冒険の話を聞く。
description.koreana: Nancy에게 호주 모험에 관한 얘기를 꺼내세요.
description.portuguese: Fala com a Nancy sobre as aventuras dela na Austrália.
description.schinese: 与Nancy谈谈她在澳大利亚的冒险经历。
description.spanish: Habla con Nancy de sus aventuras en Australia.
description.tchinese: 告訴Nancy她在澳大利亞冒險的事。

description.brazilian: Bata em ambos os gongos em ‘Espaço Entre o Tempo'.
description.dutch: Raak beide gongen in Ruimte Tussen Tijd.
description.english: Hit both of the gongs in 'Space Between Time'.
description.french: Frappez les deux gongs de l’espace infratemporel.
description.german: Triff beide Gongs in „Raum zwischen der Zeit“.
description.japanese: "時の狭間"の鐘を両方鳴らす。
description.koreana: 시간 사이의 공간'에 있는 두 공을 모두 치세요.
description.portuguese: Acerta em ambos os gongos no 'Espaço entre o tempo'.
description.schinese: 在“时空间隙”中敲响两面大锣。
description.spanish: Golpea ambos gongs en el espacio intertemporal.
description.tchinese: 在「時空裂縫」中把兩個鑼鼓都敲響。

displayName.spanish: Dejad que las calabazas vengan a mí

description.brazilian: Resgate todas as abóboras de Nevermore.
description.dutch: Red alle pompoenen van Nevermore.
description.english: Rescue all of Nevermore's pumpkins.
description.french: Secourez toutes les citrouilles de Jamaiplu.
description.german: Rette alle Nevermore-Kürbisse.
description.japanese: Nevermoreのカボチャをすべて助ける。
description.portuguese: Salva todas as abóboras da Nevermore.
description.schinese: 拯救所有Nevermore的南瓜。
description.spanish: Rescata a todas las calabazas de Nuncamás.
description.tchinese: 營救Nevermore的所有南瓜。

description.brazilian: Faça com que um inimigo seja atingido pela carruagem desgovernada de Grande Wen.
description.dutch: Laat een vijand geraakt worden door de op hol geslagen wagon van de Grote Wen.
description.english: Bait an enemy into being hit by The Great Wen's run-away carriage
description.french: Poussez un ennemi à se faire percuter par le chariot hors de contrôle de Great Wen.
description.german: Bringe einen Gegner dazu, vom wilden Wagen des Großen Wen getroffen zu werden.
description.japanese: 敵をおびき出してGreat Wenの暴走馬車と衝突させる。
description.koreana: The Great Wen의 제어 불능의 마차에 치이게 적 하나를 끌어들이세요.
description.portuguese: Atrai um inimigo a levar com a carruagem no The Great Wen.
description.schinese: 诱使敌人被大文的失控马车击中。
description.spanish: Atrae a un enemigo para que lo golpee el carruaje desbocado del Gran Wen.
description.tchinese: 引誘一名敵人被「大熔爐」關卡中的逃亡馬車撞上。

description.brazilian: Pule em todos os saquinhos de molho ketchup.
description.dutch: Spring op alle ketchupzakjes.
description.english: Jump on all the ketchup packets
description.french: Sautez sur toutes les doses de ketchup.
description.german: Springe auf alle Ketchup-Tüten.
description.japanese: すべてのケチャップパックに飛び乗る。
description.portuguese: Salta em cima de todos os pacotes de ketchup.
description.schinese: 跳到所有的番茄酱包上。
description.spanish: Salta sobre todos los paquetes de ketchup.
description.tchinese: 跳上所有番茄醬包。

displayName.japanese: 退屈なオフィスワーク

description.brazilian: Durma na mesa do Dr. Daucus.
description.dutch: Slaap op het bureau van dokter Daucus.
description.english: Sleep on Dr Daucus' desk
description.french: Dormez sur le bureau du Dr Daucus.
description.german: Schlafe auf Dr. Daucus‘ Tisch.
description.japanese: Dr Daucusの机で眠る。
description.portuguese: Dorme na secretária do Dr Daucus.
description.schinese: 在Daucus博士的办公桌上睡觉。
description.spanish: Duerme en el escritorio del Dr. Daucus.
description.tchinese: 在Daucus博士的辦公桌上睡覺。

displayName.brazilian: Você vai arrancar o olho de alguém!
displayName.german: Da tut sich noch jemand weh!
displayName.portuguese: Ainda Vazas Uma Vista a Alguém!
displayName.spanish: ¡Le vas a sacar un ojo a alguien!

description.brazilian: Faça com que um soldado koi dispare uma flecha em outro.
description.dutch: Laat één koi-soldaat een pijl naar een andere afvuren.
description.english: Bait one koi soldier into firing an arrow at another
description.french: Poussez un soldat carpe à tirer une flèche contre l’un des siens.
description.german: Bringe einen Koi-Soldaten dazu, mit einem Pfeil auf einen anderen zu schießen.
description.japanese: コイ兵士の矢を別の兵士に命中させる。
description.koreana: 코이 솔져 하나가 다른 하나에게 활을 쏘게 만드세요.
description.portuguese: Atrai um soldado Koi para ele disparar uma seta contra outro.
description.schinese: 诱使一名锦鲤士兵向另一名士兵射箭。
description.spanish: Engaña a un soldado koi para que le dispare una flecha a otro.
description.tchinese: 引誘一名錦鯉士兵向其同伴射箭。

description.brazilian: Ataque a Nancy.
description.dutch: Val Nancy aan.
description.english: Attack Nancy
description.french: Attaquez Nancy.
description.german: Greife Nancy an.
description.japanese: Nancyを攻撃する。
description.portuguese: Ataca a Nancy.
description.schinese: 攻击Nancy。
description.spanish: Ataca a Nancy.
description.tchinese: 攻擊Nancy。

description.brazilian: Faça com que um diabrete entre no meio do trânsito.
description.dutch: Lok een imp in aankomend verkeer.
description.english: Bait an Imp into oncoming traffic
description.french: Attirez un diablotin dans le trafic.
description.german: Locke einen Kobold in den anrauschenden Verkehr.
description.japanese: 小鬼を対向車線におびき出す。
description.portuguese: Atrai um imp contra o trânsito.
description.schinese: 诱使小鬼进入迎面而来的车流中。
description.spanish: Atrae a un diablillo hacia el tráfico que se aproxima.
description.tchinese: 引誘一名小嘍囉被車撞。

description.brazilian: Derrote Droo, o Estripador.
description.dutch: Versla Droo de Ripper.
description.english: Defeat Droo The Ripper
description.french: Éliminez Droo The Ripper.
description.german: Besiege Droo den Ripper.
description.japanese: Droo The Ripperを倒す。
description.portuguese: Derrota o Droo The Ripper.
description.schinese: 击败开膛手Droo。
description.spanish: Derrota a Droo el Destripador.
description.tchinese: 擊敗開膛手Droo。

displayName.japanese: 自信過剰はほどほどに

description.brazilian: Durma durante a luta contra o Dr. Daucus.
description.dutch: Slaap tijdens het eindgevecht van dokter Daucus.
description.english: Sleep during Daucus' Boss Fight
description.french: Dormez pendant le combat de boss du Dr Daucus.
description.german: Schlafe während des Dr.-Daucus-Bosskampfs.
description.japanese: Dr Daucusのボス戦の途中で眠る。
description.koreana: Dr Daucus의 보스와 싸우는 중 잠드세요.
description.portuguese: Dorme durante a luta com o Dr Daucus.
description.schinese: 在打Daucus博士的boss战时睡觉。
description.spanish: Duerme durante la lucha de jefe con el Dr. Daucus.
description.tchinese: 在Daucus博士的頭目戰期間睡覺。

description.brazilian: Durma em cima de um dos maiores jogos eletrônicos já criados.
description.dutch: Slaap bovenop de geweldige videogame ooit.
description.english: Sleep on top of the greatest video game ever made
description.french: Dormez sur le meilleur jeu vidéo de tous les temps.
description.german: Schlafe auf dem besten Videospiel aller Zeiten.
description.japanese: 最高に面白いテレビゲームの上で眠る。
description.koreana: 역사상 가장 위대한 비디오 게임 위에서 잠드세요.
description.portuguese: Dorme em cima do melhor jogo já alguma vez feito.
description.schinese: 睡在有史以来最伟大的电子游戏之上。
description.spanish: Duerme encima del videojuego más grande jamás hecho.
description.tchinese: 在有史以來最偉大的電子遊戲上睡覺。

displayName.japanese: 何てことないね Karma Llama

description.brazilian: Encontre um pergaminho de Lhama do Karma e troque por uma dica.
description.dutch: Vind een Karma Lama-rol en ruil deze voor een aanwijzing.
description.english: Find a Karma Llama scroll and exchange it for one of his hints.
description.french: Trouvez un parchemin de Karma Llama et échangez-le contre l’un de ses indices.
description.german: Finde eine Karma-Lama-Schriftrolle und tausche sie gegen einen seiner Hinweise.
description.japanese: Karma Llamaの巻物を見つけて、彼のヒントと交換する。
description.koreana: Karma Llama 스크롤을 찾고 그의 힌트 중 하나와 교환하세요.
description.portuguese: Encontra um pergaminho do Karma Llama e troca por uma das suas pistas.
description.schinese: 找到一个Karma Llamas卷轴并用其换取他的一个提示。
description.spanish: Encuentra un pergamino de las Llamas Cármicas y cámbialo por una pista.
description.tchinese: 找到一張Karma Llama的卷軸並用來和他交換一條提示。

displayName.dutch: Het lot is de rots goed gezind
displayName.spanish: La fortuna favorece a los audaces

description.brazilian: Salve Ceratopple sem sofrer qualquer dano.
description.dutch: Red Ceratoppel zonder schade op te lopen.
description.english: Save Ceratopple without taking any damage.
description.french: Sauvez Ceratopple sans subir de dégâts.
description.german: Rette Ceratopple, ohne jeglichen Schaden zu erleiden.
description.japanese: ダメージを受けずにCeratoppleを助ける。
description.portuguese: Salva o Ceratopple sem levares dano.
description.schinese: 拯救Ceratopple，且未受到任何伤害。
description.spanish: Salva Ceratopple sin recibir daño alguno.
description.tchinese: 在不受到任何傷害的情況下救下Ceratopple。

displayName.spanish: Con minero o sin minero, hago siempre lo que quiero

description.brazilian: Derrote todos os carrinhos com diabretes.
description.dutch: Versla alle mijnkarretjes van de impen.
description.english: Defeat all of the Imp minecarts
description.french: Éliminez toutes les berlines de mine des diablotins.
description.german: Besiege alle Kobold-Loren.
description.japanese: 小鬼のトロッコをすべて壊す。
description.portuguese: Derrota todos os carrinhos de mineiro dos Imps.
description.schinese: 击败所有小鬼矿车。
description.spanish: Derrota a todas las vagonetas de los diablillos.
description.tchinese: 擊敗所有小嘍囉礦車。

displayName.japanese: モニュメントグライダー

description.brazilian: Voe do topo da enorme Pedra Antiga até o globo.
description.dutch: Glij van de top van de enorme Mythische Steen naar de globe.
description.english: Glide from the top of the giant Ancient Stone to the globe
description.french: Planez du sommet de la pierre antique géante jusqu’au globe.
description.german: Rutsche von der Spitze des riesigen Antiken Steins zur Kugel.
description.japanese: 巨大な古代の石の上から"地球"まで滑空する。
description.koreana: 거대한 고대의 돌 꼭대기에서 구체로 활공하세요.
description.portuguese: Paira desde o topo da pedra anciã gigante até ao Globo.
description.schinese: 从巨大的远古之石的顶部滑向地球仪。
description.spanish: Planea desde lo alto de la piedra antigua gigante hasta el globo.
description.tchinese: 從巨大的遠古之石頂端滑翔到地球儀上。

displayName.japanese: ヘビドリンクのセールスマン
displayName.portuguese: Vendedor de Tónico de Banha de Cobra

description.brazilian: Pague o serpenteador estranhamente familiar.
description.dutch: Betaal de eigenaardig vertrouwde glibberaal.
description.english: Pay the strangely familiar slitherer.
description.french: Payez le serpent étrangement familier.
description.german: Bezahle den seltsam vertrauten Schleimbolzen.
description.japanese: どこかで見たようなクネクネにお金を払う。
description.portuguese: Paga ao rastejante estranhamente familiar.
description.schinese: 支付那位居然很眼熟的滑行者。
description.spanish: Paga al extrañamente familiar reptador.
description.tchinese: 付錢給莫名眼熟的滑行者。

displayName.japanese: キノコは乗船できません

description.brazilian: Seja bacana e encontre o cogumelo do navio.
description.dutch: Kom uit je luie paddenstoel en vind de paddenstoel van het schip.
description.english: Interact with the ship's mushroom
description.french: Devenez un champi et trouvez le champignon du vaisseau.
description.german: Werde zum Spaßvogel und finde den Pilz des Schiffs.
description.japanese: 船のキノコを見つけ出す。
description.koreana: 재밌는 사람이 되어 배의 버섯을 찾으세요.
description.portuguese: Torna-te o engraçadinho e encontra o cogumelo no barco.
description.schinese: 搞个蘑菇头，找到船上的蘑菇。
description.spanish: Pasa un buen rato buscando la seta del barco.
description.tchinese: 找到船上的真菌。

description.brazilian: Resolva o enigma da Tumba Tempus sem quebrar qualquer ladrilho.
description.dutch: Los het Tempus Tombes-raadsel op zonder blokjes te breken.
description.english: Solve the Tempus Tombs riddle without breaking any tiles
description.french: Résolvez l’énigme des Tombeaux de Tempus sans casser le moindre carreau.
description.german: Löse das „Tempus-Gräber“-Rätsel, ohne jegliche Kacheln zu zerbrechen.
description.japanese: タイルを割らずにTempus Tombsの謎を解く。
description.koreana: 어떤 타일도 부수지 않고 템푸스 무덤의 수수께끼를 푸세요.
description.portuguese: Resolve o enigma em Tempus Tombs sem partir nenhum azulejo.
description.schinese: 解开坦普斯古墓之谜，且未打破任何砖块。
description.spanish: Resuelve el acertijo de las Tumbas de Tempus sin romper ninguna baldosa.
description.tchinese: 在不破壞任何方格的情況下猜出坦普斯陵墓的謎語。

description.brazilian: Resolva o quebra-cabeças de empurrar blocos da catedral.
description.dutch: Los de blokkenpuzzel van de kathedraal op.
description.english: Solve the cathedral's push-block puzzle
description.french: Résolvez le puzzle de blocs de la cathédrale.
description.german: Löse das Schiebeblock-Rätsel der Kathedrale.
description.japanese: 大聖堂でブロックを動かすパズルを解く。
description.portuguese: Resolve o puzzle de blocos na catedral.
description.schinese: 解决大教堂的推块谜题。
description.spanish: Resuelve el puzle de empujar bloques de la catedral.
description.tchinese: 解開大教堂裡的推箱子謎題。

description.brazilian: Derrote todos os inimigos no Espaço Entre o Tempo durante uma única visita.
description.dutch: Versla elke vijand in de Ruimte Tussen Tijd gedurende één bezoekje.
description.english: Defeat every enemy in 'Space Between Time' during a single visit
description.french: Éliminez tous les ennemis de l’espace infratemporel en une seule visite.
description.german: Besiege alle Gegner in „Raum zwischen der Zeit“ bei einem einzigen Besuch.
description.japanese: 時の狭間の敵を一度ですべて倒す。
description.koreana: 1회 방문 동안 시간 사이의 공간의 모든 적을 처치하세요.
description.portuguese: Derrota todos os enimigos no Espaço Entre o Tempo numa só visita.
description.schinese: 在单次访问中击败时空间隙中的所有敌人。
description.spanish: Derrota a todos los enemigos del espacio intertemporal durante una única visita.
description.tchinese: 在單次進入時空裂縫期間擊敗裡面的所有敵人。

description.brazilian: Atraia um inimigo para o caminho de uma bala.
description.dutch: Lok een vijand in de baan van een kogel.
description.english: Lure an enemy into the path of a bullet.
description.french: Attirez un ennemi dans la trajectoire d’une balle.
description.german: Locke einen Gegner in die Flugbahn einer Kugel.
description.japanese: 敵をおびき寄せて弾を命中させる。
description.portuguese: Atrai um enimigo para a trajectória de uma bala.
description.schinese: 将一个敌人引诱到子弹轨迹的路径上。
description.spanish: Atrae a un enemigo a la trayectoria de una bala.
description.tchinese: 引誘一名敵人使其中彈。

description.brazilian: Colete todas as 110 Pedras Antigas no jogo.
description.dutch: Verzamel alle 110 Mythische Stenen in het spel.
description.english: Collect all 110 Ancient Stones in the game.
description.french: Obtenez les 110 pierres antiques du jeu.
description.german: Sammle alle 110 Antiken Steine im Spiel.
description.japanese: ゲーム内の古代の石を110個すべて集める。
description.portuguese: Coleciona todas as 110 pedras anciãs no jogo.
description.schinese: 收集游戏中的全部110个远古之石。
description.spanish: Recoge las 110 piedras antiguas del juego.
description.tchinese: 收集遊戲中的所有遠古之石（共110塊）。

displayName.brazilian: Mais fundo na toca do coelho
displayName.japanese: ウサギの巣穴の奥深く
displayName.portuguese: Bem Fundo da Toca do Coelho
displayName.spanish: En el interior de la madriguera de conejo

description.brazilian: Encontre e conclua SEGREDO1.
description.dutch: Vind en voltooi GEHEIM1.
description.english: Find and complete 'SECRET1'.
description.french: Trouvez et terminez SECRET1.
description.german: Finde und meistere GEHEIM1.
description.japanese: SECRET1を探し出してクリアする。
description.portuguese: Encontra e completa o SECRET1.
description.schinese: 找到并完成SECRET1。
description.spanish: Encuentra y completa SECRET1.
description.tchinese: 找到並完成SECRET1。

description.brazilian: Vença a Gincana do Bluebeard sem perder toda a sua saúde.
description.dutch: Voltooi Blauwbaards beproeving zonder al je gezondheid te verliezen.
description.english: Beat Bluebeard's Gauntlet without losing all of your health.
description.french: Remportez le défi de Bluebeard sans perdre toute votre santé.
description.german: Meistere Blaubarts Spießrutenlauf, ohne deine Gesundheit komplett zu verlieren.
description.japanese: HPを失わずにBluebeard's Gauntletをクリアする。
description.koreana: 모든 체력을 잃지 않고 Bluebeard의 장갑을 부수세요.
description.portuguese: Derrota o desafio do Bluebeard sem perder vida.
description.schinese: 击败Bluebeard的铁手而且没有损失掉全部生命值。
description.spanish: Supera el reto de Barbazul sin perder toda la salud.
description.tchinese: 在不失去所有生命值的情況下通過Bluebeard的嚴酷考驗。

description.brazilian: Derrote o Dr. Daucus.
description.dutch: Versla dokter Daucus.
description.english: Defeat Dr Daucus.
description.french: Éliminez le Dr Daucus.
description.german: Besiege Dr. Daucus.
description.japanese: Dr Daucusを倒す。
description.portuguese: Derrota o Dr Daucus.
description.schinese: 击败Daucus博士。
description.spanish: Derrota al Dr. Daucus.
description.tchinese: 擊敗Daucus博士。

description.brazilian: Colete todos os relógios de bolso do jogo principal.
description.dutch: Verzamel elk zakhorloge in het hoofdspel.
description.english: Collect every pocket watch in the main game.
description.french: Obtenez toutes les montres à gousset du jeu principal.
description.german: Sammle alle Taschenuhren im Hauptspiel.
description.japanese: ゲーム本編に登場する懐中時計をすべて集める。
description.portuguese: Coleciona todos os relógios de bolso no jogo principal.
description.schinese: 收集主游戏中全部的怀表。
description.spanish: Recoge todos los relojes de bolsillo del juego principal.
description.tchinese: 收集主線遊戲中的所有懷錶。
